name: The Fear Within
description:
Early Development of The Fear Within for my Computer Games Development College Course.

You are Max, a young German boy with an internal struggle eating him up. Only through exploring the Forest ahead can he truly find his peace... but something follows. Deep in the darkness, the fog, the buildings. Something... is hunting the young boy, but he must continue forward.

Find the mementoes, piece together the story and most of all... survive!

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

LSHIFT - Run

LCTRL - Sneak

F - Pause Menu

LMB - Toggle Flashlight
